p: Regarding the potential evolution of insecticide resistance in the vector, recent work in MÃ©rida, Mexico, showed that high resistance to pyrethroids in Ae. aegypti can be controlled when implementing IRS using alternative formulations, such as bendiocarb [ 29]. Such results, combined with the recent development of new IRS formulations [ 30, 31], suggest a practical insecticide management plan for IRS where various formulations are rotated to counter the evolution of resistance [ 32] in order to maintain efficacy from year to year.
